entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
